attributes.action: Change the London 2012 Olympic logo to a more suitable logo that reflects London’s culture & status.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should force the organisers of the London 2012 Olympic games to scrap the current logo which in no way reflects London’s culture or status (and it also dangerous for people with Epilepsy), and replace it with something more suitable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
